trends: There have been 136 other sightings in Toronto
There were no other sightings in Toronto on or around May 31st 1999
divs: Sighting Details My uncle, aunt, my cousin and I were driving onairport road on our way to our cottage located in wasaga beach ontario. We wereabout 20 minutes north of Toronto, the sun was setting and I first noticed astrange eliptical orangy coloured object in the sky, it appeared to be quitelarge indeed. It was difficult to tell how far away it was but it must have beenat quite a high altitude. We all took notice of it, but kept on driving. Theobject appeared to be hovering and at the same time it seemed as if it wasgetting bigger and smaller very slowly - pulsating if you will. We observed itfor the next three minutes in amazement. Later on it just seemed to dissapear.Personally, I have never seen anything like it and really have no clue what itmight have been. But since the sighting ive been reading alot about UFOs on theinternet and from other sources - it has become an on and off keen interest ofmine
Summary: eliptical orange body observed in the sky
